title: PGPD Investigating Fatal Collision in Capitol Heights
body:
The Collision Analysis and
Reconstruction Unit is investigating a fatal crash in Capitol Heights. The victim
is 44-year-old Marcus Moore of Lake Grove
Court in Crofton. On November 3, 2017, at approximately 8:10 pm, patrol officers were called to the 400 block of
Ritchie Road for the report of a collision
involving a car and a bus. The preliminary investigation
reveals Moore was heading northbound
on Ritchie Road when reasons that remain unclear, his car crossed the center line and struck a bus that was traveling
southbound. Moore was pronounced dead on the scene. A passenger in
his car suffered what appear to be non-life
threatening injuries. The bus driver was also taken to the hospital with what
appear to be non-life threatening
injuries. There were no passengers on the bus.Anyone
with information is asked to call the Collision Analysis and Reconstruction
Unit at 301-731-4422.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call
Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477);
online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com or
the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or
Google Play to download the app to your mobile device).
